hints.content:
Multiplication and division are related:

$\begin{align}
\greenD{\text{number of groups}} \times \maroonD{\text{size of groups}} = \purpleC{\text{total}} \\\\
\maroonD{\text{size of groups}} \times \greenD{\text{number of groups}} = \purpleC{\text{total}} \\\\
\\\\
\purpleC{\text{total}} \div \greenD{\text{number of groups}} =\maroonD{\text{size of groups}} \\\\
\purpleC{\text{total}} \div \maroonD{\text{size of groups}} =\greenD{\text{number of groups}}
\end{align}$

In this fact family, the $\purpleC{\text{total}}$ is $\purpleC{48}$.

The $\greenD{\text{number of the groups}}$ is $\greenD{6}$.

![Tape diagram showing 48 is equal to 6 equal groups of question mark](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/10dd5919860d8414e7f27dfd0540479ee0daa858)

The $\maroonD{\text{size of the groups}}$ is ${\maroonD{?}}$.
The equation $\greenD{6} \times {\maroonD{?}} = \purpleC{48}$ can help us find the unknown number.

question.content:
**Create an equation to help us find the unknown number in $48 \div {?} = 6$ .**

[[☃ dropdown 4]] ${} \times {?} =$ [[☃ dropdown 6]]
